de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.clustering.hierarchical

Interface HierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm<D extends Distance<D>>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - Distance type
    All Superinterfaces:
    Algorithm, Parameterizable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    NaiveAgglomerativeHierarchicalClustering, NaiveAgglomerativeHierarchicalClustering4, SLINK

    public interface HierarchicalClusteringAlgorithm<D extends Distance<D>>
extends Algorithm
    Interface for hierarchical clustering algorithms. This interface allows the algorithms to be used by e.g. ExtractFlatClusteringFromHierarchy.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      D getDistanceFactory()
      Return the distance type that will be used by the algorithm.

      Runs the algorithm.
